title: The Tale of the Blue Light
description: A man who meets himself on the moon. A blue orb that bursts into flames. The quest to explain the unexplained. In the first chapter of "Moonrise," the journey to space begins.
dc:creator: The Washington Post
itunes:author: The Washington Post
